name: Sneaky Santa (LowLevelProductions, Tomfu, EndLizz)
description:
This is is a small cute Christmas themed game, where you have to deliver the presents to make a surprise for the kids!

How to play:
Use (WASD) to move.

Avoid being seen!

You can throw (Space) Christmas ball to distract the children. (only works if you have ammunition)

Have fun :)
